LanguageData.Inaho.label: Inaho
LanguageData.Inaho.description:
Five items to eat delicious white rice
 1.【Threshing】Threshing rice, you divide into Momi and straw.
 2.【Separating】Separating rice, you divide into brown rice and outer hull
 3.【Polishing】Polishing brown rice, you divide into white rice and rice bran by Rice milling machine
 4.【Cooking】Cooking deliciously
 5.【Eating】I appreciate the grace of the earth for a delicious meal!!
LanguageData.Inaho_Mochi.label: 稲穂(もち米)
LanguageData.Inaho_Mochi.description:
もち米を美味しく食べるための五箇条
１、【脱穀】稲穂を脱穀して米(籾)と藁にわける
２、【籾摺り】米(籾付き)を籾摺りして玄米と籾殻にわける
３、【精米】玄米を精米機にかけて白米と米ぬかにわける
４、【調理】美味しく調理をする
５、【食事】大地の恵みに感謝していただきます!!
LanguageData.RiceMomi.label: Momi
LanguageData.RiceMomi.description: Rice with shells. I can not eat it.\n By threshing, you can get brown rice and by-products straw.
LanguageData.RiceMomi_Mochi.label: 籾米(もち米)
LanguageData.RiceMomi_Mochi.description: 籾付きのもち米。このまま食べることは出来ないので脱穀精米しよう!!\n脱穀することで玄米と副産物である藁を手に入れることができる。
LanguageData.BrownRice.label: Brown rice
LanguageData.BrownRice.description: By threshing and removing rice from rice, you can eat nutritious brown rice.
LanguageData.WhiteRice.label: White rice
LanguageData.WhiteRice.description: Rice that thoroughly threshed and polished.\nYou lose nutrients in the process of polishing, but the taste improves preeminently.
LanguageData.GlutinousRice.label: もち米
LanguageData.GlutinousRice.description: もちもちとした食感のお米。凍り餅の原料となる。
LanguageData.Straw.label: Солома
LanguageData.Straw.description: Побочный продукт при молотьбе.\n Полезена как корм для животных, удобрение, топливо или в ремесле.
LanguageData.Chaff.label: Outer hull
LanguageData.Chaff.description: By-product thing when separating.\n It is useful in various scenes such as animal feed(Low nutritional), fertilizer or fuel.
LanguageData.RiceBran.label: Rice bran
LanguageData.RiceBran.description: By-product thing when polishing.\n Once processed, it becomes a material for producing fertilizer, animal feed, preserved meal.
LanguageData.RiceByproduct.label: By-Products bag
LanguageData.RiceByproduct.description: A bag full of by-products of rice. It can be processed into compost and animal feed\nAlso, you can sort to Rice bran or Outher hull at the Rice crafting spot.
